Description:
About Acceldata Acceldata is an enterprise Data Observability organization that was first to the market, having coined the term ‘Data Observability’ in 2018. Founded by industry veterans who have spent decades in the AI, Analytics, and Data Monitoring space, Acceldata is a startup in the hyper-growth phase. Having raised $100 million in total, Acceldata is now a 250+ strong entity that is looking to help Enterprises and SMEs/SMBs take control of their pipelines across the cloud-native, multi-cloud, hybrid cloud, or on-premises data systems.As a result of data teams struggling to manage the data that supported mission-critical analytics and AI-based applications, Acceldata built the world’s most comprehensive data observability platform that transforms how organizations build and operate data products.Position SummaryWe are looking for a marketing and communications professional to support Acceldata's marketing and communications efforts. You will oversee the implementation of Acceldata's communications strategy and promote its products and services in order to build brand awareness and enhance customer engagement. A broad understanding of communications is required for this position.Marketing and Communications Managers are energetic, highly skilled self-starters who thrive in a fast-paced environment. The individual has experience preparing verbal, visual, and written communication materials. A Marketing Manager is agile, accurate, and thoughtful, and is able to recognize the potential bigger picture and what is needed to reach multiple audiences effectively.The Marketing Manager supports Acceldata's efforts to maintain a single, consistent brand and voice across all communications. With a global team in a distributed environment, this position is ideal for an ambitious communications professional looking to help a fast-growing company achieve its tremendous potential.This role is based in Bangalore, India (Attending the Acceldata Bangalore Office 3+ days a week is mandatory).ResponsibilitiesLead public relations activities including gathering information for and editing, award and speaking submissions and press releases.

Maintain an up-to-date press list of journalists and analysts.

Edit and support with creating promotional and product videos for social media and the company website.

Assist with scripts and storyboards.

Manage video library.

Assist, update and maintain specific sections of the company website ensuring the content is timely, accurate and appropriate.

Work with internal stakeholders and external contractors to coordinate the development and promotion of the Acceldata brand.

Maintain an organic social media plan to build and engage with target audiences.

Apply various social media tactics to create brand awareness and generate inbound traffic that strengthens the company’s social media presence.

Assist with customer marketingQualifications Bachelor’s Degree in marketing, business or related field

8-10 years of marketing experience

Exceptional verbal & written communication skills

Equally capable of working as part of a team while being self-directed and working autonomously

Excellent interpersonal skills and adept at building relationships with different stakeholders

Strong organizational, planning and project management skills

Agility and flexibility with demonstrated success in rapidly changing environments, including proven ability to manage multiple, competing priorities simultaneously

Experience managing projects from concept through fruition with a high degree of detail

Experience working in fast-paced start-ups in a high-tech environmentAcceldata is an equal-opportunity employerJob Details
